overview: The unfinished Julien Gracq text, the road 1970, a forest near the sea,  the enigma of a trajectory,  by this text in this lanscape and this landscape in this text,  it's diging, since a double echo to a same root,  deep, invisible,  an absolute presence,  a stones fire,  then, text and landscape are foliage of the same language.
title: Chemins
